i want to find an expensive/cheap restaurant
replies.user_restaurant_search_inform_delivery: no, i want to dine in. /yes, offers delivery service
replies.restaurant_inform_search_criteria: I can filter restaurants by name, location, food type, its average rating, whether or not they take reservations, and whether or not they have a delivery service.

replies.db_restaurant_inform_search_results: [RESULT] APIName = restaurant_search ; AverageRating = [NUMBER] ; AverageWaitMinutes = [NUMBER] ; CloseTimeHour = [TIME] ; Cost = [COST] ; DoesDelivery = [BOOLEAN]; Food = [FOOD_TYPE] ; Location = [LOCATION] ; MaxPartySize = [NUMBER] ; Name = [RESTAURANT_NAME] ; OpenTimeHour = [TIME] ; TakesReservations = [BOOLEAN] ; id = [NUMBER] ;
replies.restaurant_inform_search_results:
Great, I found the {restaurant_name:s}, located {location:s}. It serves {food_type:s},
has an average rating of {rating:d} and is in the {cost:s} price range
replies.restaurant_inform_nothing_found: Unfortunately there are no restaurants that match your search. Would you like to change any of your criteria?
replies.restaurant_ask_continue_searching: Would you like to search for any more restaurants?
replies.anything_else: Is there anything else that I can do for you?
replies.out_of_scope: I am sorry, I don't quite understand what you mean. I am only able to help you search for restaurants.
replies.restaurant_ask_restaurant: What restaurant would you like to go to?
replies.restaurant_ask_location: In what part of town should the restaurant be located?
replies.restaurant_ask_food_type: What cuisine are you looking for?
replies.restaurant_ask_rating: Any minimum rating that the restaurant should have?
